trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown by JScript to notify a common language runtime (CLR) host or program that an error occurred.
A <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.JScriptException"></xref> usually takes a <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.JSError"></xref> enumeration value.
A <xref:Microsoft.JScript.JScriptException> is also an <xref:Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaError> and can be passed to the host through <xref:Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaSite.OnCompilerError*>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.JScriptException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.JScriptException"></xref> class, using the specified <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.JSError"></xref>.
One of the enumeration values.
The value specifies the error.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.JScriptException"></xref> class, using the specified error message.
The message that describes the error.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.JScriptException"></xref> class, using the specified serialized data.
The serialized object data about the exception that is being thrown.
Contextual information about the source or destination.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.JScriptException"></xref> class, using the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
Gets the column in the code in which the error occurs.
The column in the code in which the error occurs, or 0 if the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Context"></xref> is null.
Gets a message that describes the error.
A message that describes the error.
Gets the column in the code in which the error ends.
The column in the code in which the error ends, or 0 if the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Context"></xref> is null.
Gets the line of code in which the error ends.
The line of code in which the error ends, or 0 if the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Context"></xref> is null.
Gets the <xref href="System.Exception.HResult"></xref> code of the error.
The <xref href="System.Exception.HResult"></xref> code of the error.
Stores information about the exception, including IsError and Code values, in the .
The serialized object data about the exception that is being thrown.
Contextual information about the source or destination.
Gets the line of code in which the error occurs.
The line of code in which the error occurs, or 0 if the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Context"></xref> is null.
Gets the text of the code in which the error occurs.
The text of the code, or an empty string if the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Context"></xref> is null.
Gets a message that describes the error.
A message that describes the error.
Gets the <xref href="System.Exception.HResult"></xref> code of the error.
The <xref href="System.Exception.HResult"></xref> code of the error.
Gets a number between 0 (most severe) and 4 (least severe) that indicates the severity of the error.
0 is the default.
A number between 0 and 4.
Gets the source code item that caused the error.
The source code item; or throws a <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.NoContextException"></xref> if the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Context"></xref> is null.
Gets the name of the source code file that contains the error.
The name of the source code file, or the string literal "no source" if the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Context"></xref> is null.
Gets the stack trace information at the time of the error.
The stack trace information.
Gets the column in the code in which the error occurs.
The column in the code in which the error occurs, or 0 if the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Context"></xref> is null.
Gets a message that describes the error.
A message that describes the error.
Gets the <xref href="System.Exception.HResult"></xref> code of the error.
The <xref href="System.Exception.HResult"></xref> code of the error.
